ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate Spews Forth... well, spews anyways
ygData.msgSnippet: The player base on Fennin Ro is so large and getting to be so high level that I rarely see Gix in his place any longer.  I look every time I go through the
ygData.messageBody:
The player base on Fennin Ro is so large and getting to be so high level
that I rarely see Gix in his place any longer. I look every time I go
through the zone. Many people want to pay him back for deaths in their
teens. Think I can take him at 29th? I tried Dvinn at 25th or 26th and was
so stupid/cocky that I didn't even get bound. Man did he smack me down.
LOADING, PLEASE WAIT... "You have entered the Arena" Doh! This is the
really odd part: A 43rd level Druid that I'd helped the day before IN KERRA
ISLE of all places happened to see me die IN CRUSHBONE and gave me a
teleport back to my corpse. Weird.

John, what level is your bard now? For that matter, what's your bard's name
and server??

> Keep a pumice stone handy.

You mean Disenchanting Melody don't you? ;)

Crier Sharpsong - 29th song bard on Fennin Ro



> If I see a griffin or hill giant near Zytl or Gix, they always
> bite the dust now. I don't even bother looting them anymore.
> They've caused me more trouble than Dorn and Dvinn combined.
> These two are so overpowered for their /con that I feel its a
> duty to rid the zone of them if but for a short time.
>
> Keep a pumice stone handy.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
